DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine interrater reliability validity Sportcord Test measure physical performance follow anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) reconstruction . A secondary purpose systematically track subjective objective outcome patient follow ACL reconstruction help identify difference subsequent knee problem . The study hypotheses follow : 1 ) The Sportcord Test provide valid reliable measure functional performance follow ACL reconstruction . 2 ) Patients subsequent knee problem 12 month study period exhibit different score clinical special test compare .
DOC.brief_title: Sport Cord Test Following ACL Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: Undergoing surgical reconstruction tear ACL . Returning participation sport ( ) . Will receive physical therapy/rehabilitation surgical reconstruction tear ACL . Between age 10 50 . Nonweight bearing . At least 12 week remove surgery . Unable walk , squat , jump/land without pain surgically repair knee .
